headline: Darden Restaurants to Release Fiscal 2026 Third Quarter Results on March 19, 2026
summary: Darden Restaurants, Inc. (NYSE: DRI) plans to release its fiscal 2026 third quarter financial results before the market opens on Thursday, March 19, 2026. The Company will host a conference call, led by Rick Cardenas, President and Chief Executive Officer, and Raj Vennam, Chief Financial Officer, to review third quarter results and conduct a question‑and‑answer session on Thursday, March 19, 2026, at 8:30 a.m. ET.
